entry.title: Millbrook - Brown Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 29.99

Millbrook - Brown Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg

Add a delicious and nutritious flour to your bakery's pantry with this Millbrook brown rice flour! This flour is made from whole grain brown rice that is carefully stone ground to produce a perfect texture and preserve the nutrients found in the bran and germ of rice kernels. While some rice flours can be gritty, Millbrook brown rice flour is especially fine and produces baked goods with a delightful texture! In addition to being high in essential nutrients like protein and fiber, this brown rice flour is gluten free, so it's suitable for serving to customers with dietary restrictions.

When used alone, rice flour can be difficult to work with and may produce a dry crumbly texture in your baked goods, so it's best used in conjunction with other wheat or gluten-free flours. Oat flour, buckwheat flour, almond flour, and garbanzo bean flour are all great additions to your gluten-free flour mix! This brown rice flour will lend a light texture and nutty flavor to your breads, muffins, pancakes, or other baked goods. It's also great to use as a gluten-free thickener for soups, stews, and gravies, or a breading for fried, grilled, or sauteed foods. No matter how you choose to use it, this brown rice flour is sure to become a staple in your kitchen; this bulk 10 Kg bag will keep you in good supply for all of your culinary needs! For optimal freshness, refrigerate or freeze this flour after opening.

entry.title: Millbrook - White Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: MillBrook
Type: FOOD
Price: 29.99

Millbrook - White Rice Flour Stone Ground - 10 Kg

Add a delicious and versatile flour to your bakery's pantry with this Millbrook white rice flour! This flour is made from pure glutinous white rice; though its name implies that this rice variety contains gluten, it actually refers to the rice's "sticky" qualities that mimic the behavior of gluten. This product is naturally gluten free and produced in Millbrook gluten free facility, so it's suitable for serving to customers with dietary restrictions! While some rice flours can be gritty, Millbrook white rice flour is especially fine and produces baked goods with a delightful texture!

When used alone, rice flour can be difficult to work with and may produce a dry crumbly texture in your baked goods, so it's best used in conjunction with other wheat or gluten-free flours. Oat flour, buckwheat flour, almond flour, and garbanzo bean flour are all great additions to your gluten-free flour mix! This white rice flour will lend a light, delicate sponginess to your breads, muffins, pancakes, or other baked goods. It's also great to use as a gluten-free thickener for soups, stews, and gravies. No matter how you choose to use it, this brown rice flour is sure to become a staple in your kitchen; this bulk 10 Kg bag will keep you in good supply for all of your culinary needs! For optimal freshness, refrigerate or freeze this flour after opening.

A leading brand in health foods, Bob's Red Mill is dedicated to providing the best products using the Old World technique of traditional stone milling. This technique allows for the inherent nutrients and flavor of their grains to be preserved, thus providing wholesome, quality foods to your kitchen. Plus, they have a separate 100% gluten free facility where they process, package, and test all of their gluten free products, so you can always be sure you are serving your customers with allergies a safe-to-eat product. Offer delicious and equally nutritious foods in your establishment with the help of Bob's Red Mill.

entry.title: India Gate - Premium Basmati Rice - 10 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: India Gate
Type: FOOD
Price: 18.99

India Gate -  Premium Basmati  Rice!

Basmati is a variety of long grain rice. Basmati rice is a kind of rice which has special aroma and flavor. These characteristics are attributed to specific harvesting, processing and geographical locations.

  • India Gate Premium basmati rice for perfect taste
  • Finest quality aged basmati rice 
  • Aromatic, raw, slim & slender grains
  • Goes well with all types of curries and cuisines

entry.title: Saleem Caravan - Super Golden Sella Basmati Rice - 40 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Salaam
Type: FOOD
Price: 59.99

Saleem Caravan - Super Golden Sella Basmati Rice - 40 Lbs

  • Golden Sella basmati has the delicious taste and visual appeal of pure Basmati, but with improved holding ability and resilience to over cooking. We simply parboil our signature basmati in its husk, a completely natural process, enabling you to cook and stir this rice without losing the texture.
  • For professional chefs, Sella makes a delicious meal in just a few minutes. In addition to being the world’s longest basmati rice, this grain has all the hearty flavor and fluffy texture of basmati—with much less cooking time.
  • Just add water, chicken broth or your favorite cooking liquid, simmer briefly and dinner is served! In fact, Sella Basmati Rice is so convenient, it can be kept warm for extended periods or even reheated in a microwave without compromising its flavor, consistency or distinctive color. What could be easier than that?

entry.title: Premium Quality Extra Long Basmati Rice - 40 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: BulkMart
Type: FOOD
Price: 49.99

Premium Quality Extra Long Basmati Rice!

  • A GOURMET CHOICE: Whether a professional chef or you simply enjoy surprising your loved ones with delicious home-cooked meals, the basmati rice is a must for your pantry!
  • ALL-NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Naturally sourced in, this premium quality extra long grain rice basmati contains no additives, fillers or chemicals, being harvested and processed under highest quality conditions.
  • EASY TO COOK & VERSATILE: Running out of ideas on easy, convenient meals? The all-natural long grain rice is easy to cook and highly versatile, being an ideal combination with various main courses, meat, vegetables and more!
  • HEALTHIER ALTERNATIVE: Our basmati rice is light, contains essential amino acids and folic acid, contributing to a healthier meal choice. Low in cholesterol and sodium, this rice contains no gluten and is ideal for people with special dietary restrictions.
  • INTENSE & DELICIOUS FLAVOR: Enjoy a smooth texture which doesn’t stick and intense, aromatic grains which are ideal in combination with all kinds of courses! Your family and dinner guests will be asking for more!

entry.title: Chef Excellent - Parboiled Rice - 20 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chef Excellence
Type: FOOD
Price: 34.99

Chef Excellent - Parboiled Rice - 20  Kg

  • Parboiled has the delicious taste and visual appeal but with improved holding ability and resilience to over cooking. We simply parboil our signature in its husk, a completely natural process, enabling you to cook and stir this Parboiled rice without losing the texture.
  • For professional chefs, Sella makes a delicious meal in just a few minutes. In addition to being the world’s longest Parboiled rice, this grain has all the hearty flavor and fluffy texture of Parboiled —with much less cooking time.
  • Just add water, chicken broth or your favorite cooking liquid, simmer briefly and dinner is served! In fact, Parboiled Rice is so convenient, it can be kept warm for extended periods or even reheated in a microwave without compromising its flavor, consistency or distinctive color. What could be easier than that?

Parboiled rice is rice that has been partially boiled in the husk. The three basic steps of parboiling are soaking, steaming and drying. These steps make the rice easier to process by hand, while also boosting its nutritional profile, changing its texture, and making it more resistant to weevils
